thread.title: Queen of South 1-0 Morton: Match Report
thread.title_full: Queen of South 1-0 Morton: Match Report

title: Queen of South 1-0 Morton: Match Report
text:
Queen of South 1-0 Morton: Match Report 10 Oct 2015 17:01:00 
comments Queen of the South end winless streak with narrow victory over MortonQueen of the South pulled out a gritty 1-0 scoreline at home to Morton to end a seven-match streak without a win.Derek Lyle was quick with his head early on to convert a cross by Alex Harris, and the Doonhamers soon threatened a second. Ryan Conroy's shot trickled agonisingly wide of Derek Gaston's net, and, shortly after, Harris' long-range effort was tipped over.The failure to score a second nearly cost the home side. Morton crept back into the game as it wore on, and the Palmerston Park club soon found themselves hanging on. Alex Samuel had a shot from eight yards out for Jim Duffy's men, but it went over. Related Sport News
